title: Trump Quietly Turned Puerto Rico Into America's Venezuela Launchpad-Here's What's Coming Next

title: Guerrilla warfare: What would a US-Venezuela war look like?

content:

title: Hegseth cites 'fog of war' in defence of second US strike on alleged drug boat
description: American defence secretary's comments come as Pope urges Donald Trump not to try to oust Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro using military force.
content:
US defence secretary Pete Hegseth has cited the "fog of war" in defence of a follow-up strike earlier this year on a boat alleged to be carrying drugs in the Caribbean Sea.

title: U.S. lawmakers to force vote on war powers if Trump attacks Venezuela
description: A group of U.S. senators who have tried repeatedly to rein in President Donald Trump's aggression against Venezuela said on Tuesday they would file a new resolution to force a congressional vote on the issue if the administration carries out a strike within the country.

title: ¿Qué pueden reclamar los pasajeros afectados por las cancelaciones de vuelos a Venezuela?
description: La Agencia Española de Seguridad Aérea (AESA) lanzó este lunes una nueva “alta recomendación” para que operadores civiles eviten sobrevolar el territorio del país suramericano hasta el 31 de diciembre

title: Maduro responde a Trump: "No queremos la paz de los esclavos ni de las colonias"
description: El presidente de Venezuela, Nicolás Maduro, ha respondido con dureza a las recientes medidas y exigencias del presidente de Estados Unidos, Donald Trump, en un acto público celebrado frente al palacio presidencial en Caracas.
